statements: SELECT user_name, user_email FROM website_personalization WHERE user_location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM website_personalization WHERE conversion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM website_personalization ORDER BY last_visit DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, pages_visited FROM website_personalization WHERE pages_visited > 10;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_location FROM website_personalization WHERE user_location LIKE '%A';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM website_personalization WHERE user_location = 'New York' ORDER BY last_visit DESC;
SELECT user_name, pages_visited FROM website_personalization WHERE conversion_status = TRUE ORDER BY pages_visited DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_email, user_location FROM website_personalization WHERE last_visit BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM website_personalization WHERE user_email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND pages_visited > 10 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM website_personalization WHERE user_location IN ('California', 'Texas') AND conversion_status = FALSE ORDER BY pages_visited DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE country = 'Canada' OR country = 'Germany'
SELECT user_id, age FROM users WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT u.username, p.dark_mode FROM users u INNER JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND country = 'USA';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT up.user_id, u.username, u.country, up.dark_mode FROM users u INNER JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE u.age < 25 AND up.dark_mode = TRUE;
SELECT u.username, up.language FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE u.country = 'Canada';
SELECT u.username, u.country, up.language FROM users u RIGHT JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE up.language = 'Spanish';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'example_user';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE date_visited > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, theme_color, font_size FROM user_preferences WHERE theme_color = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY email DESC;

SELECT u.username, up.theme_color, ua.page_visited FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.date_visited BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ua.activity_id) AS total_activities FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_activities > 5;

SELECT u.username, up.theme_color, ua.page_visited FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id LEFT JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE up.language = 'English' AND ua.page_visited LIKE '%home%' ORDER BY ua.date_visited DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, country FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE country = 'Canada';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE country = 'France' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE country = 'Germany' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM Users WHERE username = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT * FROM Preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT content_id, title, author FROM Content WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM Users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, page_visited, timestamp FROM UserBehavior WHERE interaction_type = 'click' LIMIT 10;
SELECT content_id, title, category, author FROM Content WHERE category LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY title ASC;
